report.title: Shorewatch Samples list 2
report.description: A general purpose list of samples with record counts.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM samples s JOIN surveys su on su.id=s.survey_id and su.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms tlt ON tlt.id=s.sample_method_id LEFT JOIN locations l ON l.id=s.location_id LEFT JOIN (occurrences o #agreements_join# ) on o.sample_id=s.id and o.deleted=false #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND s.deleted = false

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey, or leave for all surveys

param.name: date_from
param.where: ('#date_from#'='Click here' OR s.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date))

param.name: date_to
param.where: ('#date_to#'='Click here' OR s.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date))

param.name: sample_method_id
param.description: Select the sample method, or leave blank to not filter by sample method.

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include
